summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6081 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 8, Bay View Addition, being the alley between 28th Avenue West and 29th Avenue West from Ruffner Street to Tilden Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 83629, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
